import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Select, Divider, Form, Button, Row, Col, Card, Input, DatePicker, TimePicker } from 'antd'; export default function TrackingSheet() { const { Option } = Select; const [items, setItems] = useState(['Stage 1']); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const onFinish = (values) => { console.log(values); }; const onChange = (date, dateString) => { console.log(date, dateString); } onNameChange = event => { this.setState({ name: event.target.value, }); }; addItem = () => { console.log('addItem'); setItems([...items, name || `New item ${index++}`]) }; return ( <>
Stage Tracking

For active pulse processing the Stage Start, End and Pre & Post Frac pulse times must be entered into the Stage sheet before one attempts to process active pulses in the NF app. If not entered the app will not function. Add item
)} > {items.map(item => ( ))}
); }
